searchForWinner() - Method in class Main.SpaceInvaders
This method checks each frame to see if any of the win/loss conditions have been met.

Simple setter for if the ship is moving or not.

shootIfAble() - Method in class Main.SpaceInvaders
shootIfAble() checks whenever the spacebar is pressed, if the ship can add another shot to the projectile array.

sleep() - Method in class Main.SpaceInvaders
This sleeps the loop for SLEEP_TIME to give the illusion of motion.
SLEEP_TIME - Variable in class Main.SpaceInvaders
 
SpaceInvaders - Class in Main
 
SpaceInvaders() - Constructor for class Main.SpaceInvaders
The constructor for the game is responsible for setting up the frame, adding a new panel to it, and setting up various other boilerplate code for smooth animation.
SpaceShip - Class in GameObjects
The SpaceShip child class differentiates itself from Projectiles in that it has various additions that allow greater control over the movement of the GameObject, and graphical display.
SpaceShip() - Constructor for class GameObjects.SpaceShip
Default constructor for the SpaceShip just uses the default super constructor to initialize the data members.
SpaceShip(int, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class GameObjects.SpaceShip
The constructor for this child class just passes values up to the superclass.
